ComicInfo.Penciller: David Namisato,Mark Slater,Ander Sarabia,Dave Baker,Mark Slater,Ander Sarabia,Dave Baker,David Namisato
ComicInfo.Summary: Four awesome stories that are sure to make you laugh and cry! Easily the greatest 21 letter titled comic in history- that has zombies and cheerleaders! Featuring a Mandy cover by Dean Yeagle! Also, covers by Jeremy Dale, Rich Bonk and Jose Jaro.
ComicInfo.Title: Alter Ego; If It Doesn't Hurt Then You're Probably Doing It Wrong; PomPom, the Dead Killer; A New You
ComicInfo.Writer: Steven L. Frank,Eric M. Esquivel,Dave Baker,Steven L. Frank,Eric M. Esquivel,Dave Baker
